## IGraphAttachPoint.updateBoundingRects() method

Interaction handlers depend on the position of the element on the screen to determine the relative position of the cursor. This updates [ICanvasDimensions.boundingRect](./core.icanvasdimensions.boundingrect.md) on the current canvasDims.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateBoundingRects(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
